price: Hari ab’iburyo;[1] abo bantu b’iburyo ni bantu ki?
footnotes: [1] Abantu b’iburyo ni abakoze ibikorwa byiza, bazahabwa igitabo mu kuboko kwabo kw’iburyo gikubiyemo ibikorwa bakoze bakiri ku isi. Naho ab’ibumoso ni abakoze ibikorwa bibi, bazahabwa icyo gitabo mu kuboko kw’ibumoso.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.
